bill_title: make an appropriation for costs related to emergencies and disasters impacting the state and to declare an emergency.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to make an appropriation for costs related to emergencies and disasters impacting the state and to declare an emergency. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of $2,776,341 to the special emergency and disaster special revenue fund for costs related to any emergency or disaster, as defined in § 34-48A-1, impacting this state. Section 2. The secretary of the Department of Public Safety shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the support of the state government and its existing public institutions, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval.
